title: Untitled
medium: gouache and oil pastel on board
provenance_text:
Carl-Henning Pedersen [1913-2007], Copenhagen, Denmark. James L. Winokur [1922-2009], Pittsburgh, PA, by 1977; partial gifts to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, 1977 to 1984 [1].

Notes:
[1]. The work was accessioned as a 1977 year-end partial gift on February 9, 1978. It was received at the museum on December 31, 1984. Committee action on completion of the gift as a 1984 year-end gift was taken on February 7, 1985.
